articles.author: Victoria Kennedy
articles.title: Cyberpunk 2077 Ultimate Edition announced, launches next month - Eurogamer.net
articles.description: CD Projekt Red has announced its Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition, which will include both the base game and its expansion Phantom Liberty.
articles.content:
CD Projekt Red has announced its Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition, which will include both the base game and its expansion Phantom Liberty. 
CDPR's Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition is set to release… [+1936 chars]
